title: 08/20/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 08/20/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin gives his takeaway from the Patriots second preseason game as the quarterback competition between Cam Newton and rookie Mac Jones heats up. He believes the Cowboys need to admit there is reason to be concerned about Dak Prescott’s shoulder injury as the regular season continues to get closer. He also explains why LeBron James should still be considered the best player in the NBA. Plus, WWE superstar Charlotte Flair joins the show to talk about preparing for SummerSlam and her favorite SmackDown moment. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
